description: Observation requested by London Borough of Southwark for outline planning permission (all matters reserved) for works of hard and soft landscaping to create a shared public realm space for use by pedestrians and vehicles. The proposals will retain and re-provide access for servicing vehicles to Porters Edge, and will improve the street through the provision of new trees and other planting, alongside new street furniture and surface finishes to enable the use of the space for play and recreation.  The application is submitted alongside planning application ref. 21.AP.2610 which proposes works to Maritime Street as part of a masterplan for both sites. The application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement submitted pursuant to the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) regulations 2017. The ES can be viewed on the Council's website. Alternatively, Trium will supply the ES on a USB at a charge of Â£20. For copies members of the public should contact Trium directly as detailed in ES Volume 1, Chapter 1 Introduction. Re-consultation due to amendments to servicing and access arrangements, enlarged public realm, design enhancements and revised/additional plans and documents being submitted. Re-consultation due to the following amendments to the proposal and revised/additional plans and documents being submitted Amendments comprise - Removal of potential temporary servicing access for Building A1 - Increase size of Waterfront Square by reducing the footprint for Building A2 - Removal of construction vehicle access to the site - Additional design details provided  Additional/revised information comprises: - Revised Parameter Plans (Plot Extent Dominant Face, Proposed Plot Extent Ground Level, Proposed Plot Extent Upper Levels,    Proposed Vehicular Access, Definition of Shoulder Height and Proposed Public Realm Extent) - Revised Design Code for Buildings; - Affordable Workspace Addendum - Design and Access Statement Addendum - Statement of Conformity with the Environmental Statement and Trium response the Councils initial review of the Environmental    Statement ; - Revised Construction Environmental Management Plan; - Transport Assessment Addendum including revised Delivery and Servicing Management Plan; - Revised Development Specification. - Revised Geo-Environmental Study - Arboricultural Impact Assessment Addendum - Additional Surrey Quays Road illustrative views sequence - Updated Urban Greening Factor Report (December 2021) and UGF surface cover plan (ref. TOWN748(02)3003 Rev P1) - Additional information for Whole Life Cycle Assessment - Land Ownership Plan
